flawed_nl_solution:
Todd has $25 left after buying ingredients because 100 - 75 = <<100-75=25>>25
Todd made $150 selling snow-cones because 200 x 0.75 = <<200*0.75=150>>150
Todd has $175 before he pays his brother back because 25 + 150 = <<25+150=175>>175
After Todd pays his brother back he has $62 because 175 - 110 = <<175-110=62>>62
#### 62

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 65, not 62. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
